ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] By the way
ygData.msgSnippet: One idea you can do is transfering your characters. No not really, you can t really transfer characters, but you can make new people with the same look and the
ygData.messageBody:
One idea you can do is transfering your characters.

No not really, you can't really transfer characters, but you can make new
people with the same look and the same class and the same name.

And you will find that the second time you play a class, it is much easier
to progress than the first time!

I recommend everyone at least try playing on RN, to experience what it's
like playing in the guild.

Christina
